page.title: 17Bunyan Meeting
page.content: The Bunyan Chapel was built in 1885 as a Sunday School for 100 children from the parish with 26 teachers.This year a service was held on the 19th May to celebrate 100 years of the chapel. Worship was enhanced by readings and choruses from the children and a short history of the chapel.The service also included the annual prize-giving. Numbers are increasing at the Sunday School where around 15 children aged 4-12 regularly attend.The chapel now has a new minister who together with an associate minister work in the pastorate of the 5 Bunyan churches in Bedford, Goldington, Elstow, Kempston and Stagsden.
